overview:
Moritz v. Grotthuss is a angel-consultant within experience in strategy, business development, financing and general management.

Moritz is a fully trained lawyer (Germany & Mexico) with >10 years of start-up experience as a consultant, early stage investor and manager. In 2012 he started to open up an independent office for angel-consultancy for promising start-up companies.

In 2012 Moritz joined the start-up company gestigon as Managing Director. gestigon develops gesture recognition solutions based on 3D data. Moritz ist resposible for Business Development, Strategy and Financials incl. Investor Relations.

external_links.title: interview on venturevillage / gesture recognition @ gestigon
